Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Significantly more P9605 patients developed leukoencephalopathy compared with P9201 patients ( 68 % , 95 % confidence interval 49 % - 83 % vs . 22 % , 95 % confidence interval 5 % - 44 % ; P = 0 . 001 ) identified as late as 7 . 7 years after the end of treatment .

| Disease |
| --- |
| Leukoencephalopathy |
| P9605 patients' disease (implied) |
| P9201 patients' disease (implied) |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "leukoencephalopathy" as a specific disease that affected a larger proportion of P9605 patients compared to P9201 patients. The diseases of P9605 and P9201 patients are implied but not explicitly stated in the paragraph.

Therefore, "leukoencephalopathy" is the only valid disease entity in the paragraph. The other entities mentioned, such as "P9605 patients" and "P9201 patients," do not clearly refer to diseases, but rather to patient groups.
